Very often I think of the rich promises given us in the Word in regard to God's keeping power. 


            -229- 

We are kept by His power. How reasonable, then, it is that we should be careful to walk in the footsteps of Jesus. He says, "I am the Light of the world: he that followeth Me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life." Of those who walk in this light He declares, "Ye are the light of the world.... Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven."
